entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
